name: A Broken Dream
description:
THIS GAME IS SAVED! so please try to finish it. (There is a problem with itch.io web game though, so if you want to play the whole game but not in one sitting, you have to download it.)

You have been having nightmares for a long time. As a result, you travel inside of your mind to seek out as many nice dreams as possible then reach the exit to finally have a peaceful sleep.

WASD or the arrow keys to move around. Collect all the nice dreams in a level and enter the door to go to the next level. Along the way, you will find various obstacles such as the veins in your brain blocking your path, the path filled with small and big nightmares moving around unpredictably, and the doors teleporting around as if you are hallucinating.

This game was started for the MiniJam - Dream and updated for the Weekly Game Jam 77 - Inside Out. I will continue updating this game.
